extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseHelper()
      Constructor for database helper, Requires that the user is already authenticated to firebase in the calling activity

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseHelper

        public DatabaseHelper()
        Constructor for database helper, Requires that the user is already authenticated to firebase in the calling activity

    • Method Detail

      • isUsernameAvailable

        public void isUsernameAvailable(java.lang.String username,
                                BooleanCallback onCallback)
        Get the same instance of database helper, This is done to only have one DatabaseHelper running
        Parameters:
        username - to be checked against registered usernames for uniqueness
        onCallback - the function which will be called once the result is available Since database access is asynchronous, the result will not be available right away. Instead, once the result comes back it can be dealt with using various Callback interfaces

      • getCurrentUser

        public com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseUser getCurrentUser()
        Get the FirebaseAuth user object that is currently in use
        Returns:
        FirebaseAuth user object

      • isRegistered

        public void isRegistered(BooleanCallback onCallback)
        Check if the current user (getCurrentUser) is registered in the database as a full user object
        Parameters:
        onCallback - the callback that will be used to signal that the asynchronous database search has been completed

      • isUserLoggedin

        public boolean isUserLoggedin()
        Check if the user is authenticated as a FirebaseAuth object
        Returns:
        boolean true if the firebaseAuth object exists (logged in) boolean false otherwise

      • signOut

        public void signOut()
        Sign out the current FirebaseAuth user object by calling signOut() and setting currentUser to null

      • getBookFromDatabase

        public void getBookFromDatabase(java.lang.String isbn,
                                BookCallback callback)
        Goes to the firebase database and fetches (asynchronously) the Book coresponding to isbn
        Parameters:
        isbn - the string representing a valid book ISBN that google books api can use/search
        callback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data acquisition

      • getUserFromDatabase

        public void getUserFromDatabase(UserCallback onCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database and fetches (asynchronously) the currentUser custom User object
        Parameters:
        onCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data acquisition used to pass data back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • getCurrentUserInfoFromDatabase

        public void getCurrentUserInfoFromDatabase(UserInformationCallback onCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database and fetches (asynchronously) the currentUser custom UserInformation object
        Parameters:
        onCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data acquisition used to pass data back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • getUserInfoFromDatabase

        public void getUserInfoFromDatabase(java.lang.String username,
                                    UserInformationCallback onCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database and fetches (asynchronously) the currentUser custom UserInformation object
        Parameters:
        username - The username to use when searching for specific user info
        onCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data acquisition used to pass data back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • saveCurrentUser

        public void saveCurrentUser(User user,
                            BooleanCallback onCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database and saves (asynchronously) the currentUser's custom User object
        Parameters:
        user - The currentuser's custom User object that is to be written/updated in the database
        onCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data write used to pass completion status back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • registerUser

        public void registerUser(User user,
                         BooleanCallback onCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database to register and save (asynchronously) the currentUser's custom User object
        Parameters:
        user - The currentuser's custom User object that is to be written in the database
        onCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data write used to pass completion status back to calling activity/fragment/class

      • updateUserInfo

        public void updateUserInfo(UserInformation userInfo,
                           BooleanCallback onCallback)
        Goes to the firebase database to update (asynchronously) the currentUser's custom UserInfo object
        Parameters:
        userInfo - The currentuser's custom UserInfo object that is to be updated in the database
        onCallback - The callback which is passed in, to be called upon successful data write used to pass completion status back to calling activity/fragment/class
